scripts.dev: cd server && npm run dev & cd client && npm run start
scripts.start: cd server && NODE_ENV='production' npm run start
scripts.start-all: cd server && npm run start & cd client && npm run start
scripts.install: cd server && npm install & cd client && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false cd server && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build --prefix client
